rows.label: tev010501_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Gus about the purpose of BLADE.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Gus if he's heard any interesting rumors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0001
rows.name:
Well, I'm in the Outfitters division, so my duty is to
help the arms manufacturers develop new weaponry.
Er, I guess?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0002
rows.name:
Anyway, BLADE is an organization that devotes itself
to building a future for humanity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0003
rows.name:
...At least that's what the BLADE handbook says.
And there's no shortage of idiots who believe it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0004
rows.name:
Me, I joined up because being a BLADE pays better
than any other gig out there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0005
rows.name:
Do your missions right, and you'll make more bank
than a civvy could ever hope to see, no matter how
hard they work![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0008
rows.name:
Rumors, eh? Maybe you wanna hear about some
easier ways to make money?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yeah, I got a little something in the works.
But you look like a [ST:gender p1=fellow p2=lady ] who's got more than a few
brain cells to rub together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0010
rows.name:
And to pull off my plan, I'm gonna need some of the
dimmest bulbs that BLADE has to offer.
So I got no use for the likes of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0011
rows.name:
I need people who are gullible enough to believe
anything! Marks I can squeeze completely dry![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0012
rows.name:
Like that one Curator. You know? Quincy?
That's exactly the level of stupid I'm looking for.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0020
rows.name:
If you want to earn some serious money, go to
Mission Control and take a bunch of minor jobs.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0021
rows.name:
Then pursue those at the same time as you're out doing
big missions to earn rewards on top of rewards.
THAT'S using the old noodle right there![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0022
rows.name:
Beyond that, you should try to install as many research
data probes as you can. Although to be honest, that's
way too much work for me to bother with.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev010501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Why do yourself what you can manipulate some other
dope into doing for you? Let them focus on completing
the missions while you focus on skimming the reward![ST:wait ]
